data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wong, Kingsley J. H., Shih, Hsi-Te, Chan, Benny K. K. (2012): The ghost crab Ocypode mortoni George, 1982 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Ocypodidae): redescription, distribution at its type locality, and the phylogeny of East Asian Ocypode species. Zootaxa 3550: 71-87, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213893
